Tina's expression changed somewhat as she thought over my lie. It also helped that mom kept the washing machine on the top floor since she didn't feel like venturing to the basement to wash clothes.

"Whatever." she sighed. Good, the sooner she bought my lie and left, the better. "Anyway, while I have you, have you seen mom around anywhere? I thought I heard the door."

Crap. "I think mom went out to run errands or something. Wouldn't be the first time she left without telling someone." I said smoothly.

"Uh huh." Tina nodded before walking past me. As she did my eyes widened a fraction as she stepped over where Sandra's clothes used to be before taking a spot on the couch. "Well if she's out then I'm taking the TV."

"Sure." I said as I briefly stared at the spot Tina stepped and then gave the spot by the door a quick glance. She didn't know it, but in a moment of panic I actually shrank mom and Sandra to the point of near invisibility to cover my ass. All I had to time to do was pick up their clothes to look less guilty. A part of me hoped Tina didn't actually crush the saleswoman under her foot.

"Well?" Tina asked as she began to channel surf.

"Well what?" I answered.

"Why are you still standing here? Weren't you doing laundry?" she reminded.

"Right." I said as I began to carefully make my way to mom's position.

"Oh, and don't forget my clothes while your at it. They're in a plastic bag on my door." Tina said offhandedly.

Now it was my turn to sigh. "Whatever."
132243.title: Vanishing Act

choices: Let Tina join the others. Toy with Taylor.
Leave Tina as is, let Taylor find her.
1322433.content:
Matt's eyes scanned the wood floor where his mom had previously stood, finding nothing but varying tones of grain in the pattern. Getting on one knee he put his cheek to the floor to get a better vantage.

"What the hell are you doing?" Tina said as she looked back towards Matt with disgust. "Are you seriously sniffing mom's underwear you fucking creep?!"

"N-no! I'm just...looking for something." Matt stammered back defensively.

"Well look somewhere else freak, Taylor's coming over soon. Don't need you ruining my rep infront of my friends."

Matt was embarrassed and angry at Tina for for snidely looking down at him. Then something clicked in his head. Picking up the remote Matt strolled around the couch and positioned himself between Tina and the TV.

"Can I help you?" Tina snidely remarked in annoyance.

"I figured I might as well take your clothes as well since I'm here. Why make two trips?"

Pointing the remote at Tina he pressed hit her with a short burst.

"What the hell are you-" she trailed off as her shoulder strap fell down her arm. Her exposed blue bra strap appeared somewhat loose, and Matt noticed her discomfort as she furrowed her brows in confusion.

"Something wrong?" Matt cheerfully chimed in as he toward over the shrinking girl. Tina looked down at herself wide-eyed as her clothes continued to grow on her. Matt discreetly shot her again with the remote while she was distracted.

"W-what's going on?" She yelled nervously. Her breasts popped into view as her top gave way to her shrinking frame. Covering herself she yelled loudly as she reached for her garments with her other hand. Further she shrank, eventually stopping at a foot and a half. She was swimming in her clothes as the fabric tangled itself around her.

A knock on the door pulled Matt's attention away from his shrinking bratty sister. "Tina! Everything good in there?" A familiar female voice called out. Taylor was at the front door, and that complicated matters for Matt.
1322433.title: I used the remote on Tina

choices: Karen turns the shoe upside down and taps ir
Sandra put the shoe away and takes out another pair
1323.content:
Laughing to myself I thought about the pranks I could pull off with the remote. Well, looks like mom liked the shoes she was looking at, I could try to steal some while the sales woman was occupied.

Exiting the living room and immediately hiding next to the door frame, I took out the remote and shrunk myself. The expanding house was mesmerizing me and for a moment there, I was to distracted to stop firing, I stopped shrinking at 5 inches tall when I couldn't hold the remote properly in my hands. I was still big enough to grow back and at that size, stealing shoes might still be possible.

I stepped back in the living room, unseen this time and made my way toward the couch were Karen was still trying on shoes while the lady helped her.

I snuck around the building sized couch, tuning out the conversation the two giantesses were having on the other side as I made my way to the few box of shoes scattered on the side.

Opening the lid of the nearest box, I peaked inside before looking around. The two women were still occupied and the coast was clear. I grinned and climbed inside. After a few minutes of work, I was able to topple the box on the side and start pulling a shoe out of the living room.

I had to stop in my tracks, however, when I hear Sandra say to my mom:

"Wait, I think I've got exactly what you need over there!" Before she walked to the toppled box with a shoe missing.

"That's strange, where is the other one?" Asked Sandra aloud looking around.

Panic seized me, it wouldn't be long before Sandra finds the missing shoe, and me with it!

Without thinking, I jumped in the shoe, and hid at the tip, out of sight just as I heard Sandra.

"Ah there it is! Wonder how it got that far!"

I felt tremors all around me and saw the light pooling in from the shoe's opening getting obscured by a large shadow. Without warning, I let a small yelp escape as the shoe is lifted in the air and brought to my mother.

"Here, try those!" Sandra says.

"Oh they're quite beautiful answered my mom, sounding pleased.

OH-OH, I thought before a incredibly large foot started snaking it's way in the shoe, and heading toward me. Instantly, I feel the immense pressure of my mom's foot trying to reach the end but meeting my body instead. It feels like I'm getting crushed alive, but fortunately, it is short lived before the foot departs.

"This one doesn't fit. Feels like there something stuck inside." My mom says.
1323.title: Shoe Diving

info.brief_description: A lightning bolt transforms Matt's TV remote into a device that can change sizes...
info.description:
READ THE RULES! And stop adding one-sentence chapters just to have more choices. I'll delete them!

The leading character in this story is Matt (22, 5'9''). He lives a boring, average live with his mom Karen (40, 5'1'') and sister Tina (19, 5'6'') on the edge of town. His parents are divorced, dad left to Mexico a few years back never to be seen again.

If you add to the story, please follow these rules:

- STAY IN FIRST PERSON, NO POV SWITCHES
- don't end the story!
- don't name new characters the same as an existing one (it confuses readers)
- don't add new functions to the remote. It either makes people shrink or grow!
- the remote doesn't work on clothing
- no killing
- no toilet-stuff
- no characters under the age of 18
- no one sentence chapters
- no male gay
- anything contrary to these rules or which in my opinion harms the interactive will be deleted or edited
